register.heading: Registration in Lumenway
register.backButtonLabel: Already have an account? Sign in
register.usernameDescription: The input field for the user's name
register.emailDescription: The input field for the E-mail
register.passwordDescription: The password must contain at least 8 characters
register.successAlertDescription: An email has been sent to your email address to confirm registration. If you haven't found the email, then check the «Spam» folder

verify.heading: Account verification
verify.successMessage: Your account has been successfully verified!

login.heading: Authorization in Lumenway
login.loginDescription: The input field for the user's name
login.passwordDescription: The password must contain at least 8 characters
login.pinDescription: Enter the code from your application for authentication

resetPassword.heading: Reset password
resetPassword.backButtonLabel: Already have an account? Sign in
resetPassword.emailDescription: The input field for the E-mail
resetPassword.successAlertDescription: The password reset link has been sent to your email. If you have notifications enabled in Telegram, then the link has also been sent there.

newPassword.heading: New password
newPassword.backButtonLabel: Already have an account? Sign in
newPassword.passwordDescription: Enter a new password for your account
newPassword.successMessage: The password has been successfully changed
newPassword.errorMessage: Error when setting a new password!

deactivate.heading: Deactivate account
deactivate.pinDescription: A confirmation code has been sent to your email. If you have Telegram notifications enabled, the link has also been sent there.
deactivate.successMessage: You have successfully deactivated your account

header.heading: Settings
header.description: Here you can manage your settings

header.heading: Profile
header.description: Customize your profile to make it more attractive to other users

avatar.heading: Avatar

confirmModal.heading: Remove avatar
confirmModal.message: Are you sure you want to delete your avatar? This action cannot be undone!

avatar.info: Supported formats: JPG, JPEG, PNG, WEBP and GIF. Maximum size: 10 MB.

info.heading: Profile Settings
info.usernameDescription: This is the name you will be known by to other users
info.displayNameDescription: Use capital letters for your username
info.bioDescription: Your profile information must be no more than 300 characters

createForm.heading: Social Links
createForm.urlDescription: Where does this link go? Enter the full URL, for example https://github.com/mquires

editForm.successRemoveMessage: Link to social network successfully removed

header.heading: Account
header.description: Manage your account settings, including access control, security, and deactivation
header.securityDescription: Set up two-factor authentication for extra security
header.deactivationDescription: If you want to temporarily or permanently deactivate your account, use this option

password.heading: Account password
password.oldPasswordDescription: Enter your old password to verify your identity
password.newPasswordDescription: Your new password must be at least 8 characters long

twoFactor.heading: TOTP Authentication
twoFactor.description: Improve your account security with TOTP authentication. This is an additional level of account security that requires entering a unique code

enable.heading: Enable TOTP
enable.qrInstructions: Scan the QR code to add TOTP
enable.pinDescription: Enter the 6-digit code provided by your authentication app

disable.heading: Are you sure you want to disable TOTP?
disable.message: Disabling TOTP authentication will make your account less secure. Are you sure you want to continue?

deactivation.heading: Account deactivation
deactivation.description: After deactivating your account, you will not be able to log in. After 7 days, the account will be completely deleted. Until then, you can contact technical support to restore your account

confirmModal.heading: Deactivation confirmation
confirmModal.message: Are you sure you want to deactivate your account? You can only restore access within 7 days

header.heading: Appearance
header.description: Customize the appearance of the platform to your taste. Choose a theme and language to make your interaction more comfortable.

theme.heading: Change theme
theme.description: You can choose a comfortable theme
theme.successMessage: The site theme has been successfully changed

color.heading: Accent color
color.description: Select an accent color for the interface

header.heading: Notifications
header.description: Set up notifications from Lumenway to receive notifications about new broadcasts on channels you follow, as well as about your new subscribers

webNotifications.heading: Website notifications
webNotifications.description: If you turn off website notifications, you will no longer receive new notifications about subscribers to your channel and about new broadcasts

telegramNotifications.heading: Telegram notifications
telegramNotifications.description: If you enable notifications via Telegram, you will be able to receive messages about new channel subscriptions, new broadcasts, password resets, and two-factor authentication codes

notifications.successMessage: Notification settings have been updated successfully

header.heading: Sessions
header.description: Here are active sessions on the devices you have logged in from

confirmModal.heading: Delete session
confirmModal.message: Are you sure you want to delete this session? This action will end all active actions on this device

header.heading: Stream Keys
header.description: Generate URL and key for broadcasting

instructionModal.heading: Instructions for setting up OBS for live broadcasts
instructionModal.description: To start broadcasting, follow the detailed instructions for connecting OBS Studio.

step1.title: Step 1: Installing OBS Studio and generating a Server URL and Stream Key
step1.description: To start broadcasting, you need to get a Server URL and Stream Key.

instructionModal.downloadObsDescription: Before to start setting up your stream, you should install OBS Studio
instructionModal.copyKeys: Copy the Server URL and Stream Key
instructionModal.copyKeysDescription: Once generated, two fields will appear on the screen: Server URL and Stream Key. Click the copy icons next to each field to save the data to the clipboard

step2.title: Step 2: Setting up OBS Studio
step2.description: Now that you have the necessary data, let's set up OBS to work with your stream:

instructionModal.openObsDescription: If you don't have OBS Studio installed yet, download it from the official website and install it. After launching, the OBS main page will open.
instructionModal.openStreamSettingsDescription: In the top menu, click «File» → «Settings». Go to the «Broadcast» tab.
instructionModal.enterDetailsDescription: In the «Service» field, select the «Custom...» option. Paste the Server URL you copied earlier into the «URL» field. In the Stream Key field, paste your Stream Key.
instructionModal.saveSettingsDescription: Click Apply and then OK to save your changes.

step3.title: Step 3: Start Streaming
step3.description: Once OBS is successfully set up, you're ready to start streaming live:

instructionModal.startStreamDescription: Back to the OBS main screen and click the Start Streaming button.
instructionModal.monitorStreamDescription: Your stream will now begin in real-time, and you'll be able to monitor it both on the platform and in OBS.
instructionModal.congrats: Congratulations! You've now successfully set up OBS to stream on our platform. Your audience is waiting for new highlights and content!

createModal.heading: Generate keys
createModal.ingressTypeDescription: Select RTMP for classic broadcasting or WHIP for WebRTC connections.

header.heading: Chat settings
header.description: Here you can manage your chat settings

isChatEnabled.heading: Enable chat
isChatEnabled.description: If you enable chat, viewers will be able to write messages in the chat during your broadcast

isChatFollowersOnly.heading: Chat only for subscribers
isChatFollowersOnly.description: If you enable this setting, only your viewers will be able to write messages in the chat

isChatPremiumFollowersOnly.heading: Chat only for premium subscribers
isChatPremiumFollowersOnly.description: If you enable this setting, only premium viewers will be able to write messages in the chat

header.heading: Followers
header.description: Here is a list of all your followers

header.heading: Sponsors
header.description: Here is a list of all your sponsors

header.heading: Premium plans
header.description: Here is a list of Premium plans for your channel

alert.heading: Channel verification required
alert.description: To create Premium plans, your channel must be verified. To do this, the channel must have at least 10 subscribers to unlock this feature

createForm.heading: Create plan
createForm.titleDescription: Enter a name for your plan. This name will be displayed to your subscribers
createForm.descriptionDescription: Add a description of the plan to describe all the benefits subscriptions
createForm.priceDescription: Please enter your plan price in $

header.heading: Transactions
header.description: Transactions related to registration of sponsors for the channel are displayed here

emptyState.heading: Nothing found
emptyState.description: Unfortunately, nothing was found for your request. Try another request?
